mapper.insert: insert into t_power (powerId, powerName, powerType, priority, parentId, parentIds, permission, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy) values (#{powerid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{powername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{powertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_power set powerName = #{powername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, powerType = #{powertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parentIds = #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where powerId = #{powerid,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select powerId, powerName, powerType, priority, parentId, parentIds, permission, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_power where powerId = #{powerid,jdbcType=TINYINT}
select powerId, powerName, powerType, priority, parentId, parentIds, permission, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_power
